pita_algorithm.base.asset_placement.validator module¶

class pita_algorithm.base.asset_placement.validator.Validator(rules: list[pita_algorithm.base.asset_placement.abstract_rule.Rule] = [])[source]¶

Bases: object

Validates new objects against a set of rules and stores a 2d representation of the world.

add(mujoco_object: MujocoObject)[source]¶

Adds object to 2d representation.

Parameters:

mujoco_object (MujocoObject) – The new object that will be added to the 2d representation

plot(env_size: tuple[int, int, float])[source]¶

Plots the current 2d representation to where the current mpl backend points.

Parameters:

env_size (tuple[int, int, float]) – Tuple containing the size of the environment

validate(mujoco_object: MujocoObject, site: AbstractSite) → bool[source]¶

If all rules are satisfied, the new object will be included in the 2d representation and placement is valid.

Parameters:

  • mujoco_object (MujocoObject) – the new object, that will be evaluated

  • site (AbstractSite) – AbstractSite class instance where the object is added to

Returns:

True if the new object satisfies all rules

Return type:

(bool)
